1$ Prince Street
Rochester, New York
Dear Mr. Lyoni
Please nerrait me to welcome you to membership in the IJAIB and to
assure you of our interest in making the full facilities of our organization
available to you in any way wherein we may be of service.
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters, now 28 years
old, has always been the voice of educational broadcasting and individuals
who are interested in utilizing radio and television as an educational tool*
During the past several years the organization has increased its activities
many times and its scope of influence. You are, no doubt, aware of the NAEB
Tape Network whereby many of the world*s finest programs are made available
for broadcasting on the educational stations throughout the country. This
activity has expanded from a three programs per week "bicycle** network to
direct service on approximately eight hours of programirdng per week. During
tiie past twelve months, through direct negotiations with countries of Western
Europe, we have increased the flow of cultural and Informational programs
in both directions to a considerable extent and expect to expand our inter¬
national exchange considerably during the current year.
Each year NAEB conducts several soninnrs and workshops for the
upgrading of personnel and through a grants-in-aid orogram made oossible
by the Fund for Adult Education has been able to contribute to the improve¬
ment of programr ing on the local level to a significant extent. This year
we have created a special committee within the organization, headed by Mr*
Gale Addins of Radio House at the University of Texas, to devote particular
attention to the problems of our associate members, and two special com¬
mittors are spending a considerable amount of time to the problems of school
stations. We hope td continue to serve the needs of educational radio and
television stations and educational radio and television production groups
increasingly in the future.
I trust that your membership in NaEB will offer stimulating and
rewarding contacts, information, and services during the year ahead. Please
feel free to call upon me directly or upon our headquarters office for any
services we may be able to render.
Very sincerely yours.
GAipse
Graydon Ausmus
President
